title: What Happened to the Beauty Queen?
description: In this Dateline classic, Nona Dirksmeyer, a young beauty queen, was planning a future with a boyfriend she adored. Then, she was brutally killed. The crime shakes her hometown and exposes someone with a secret past. Will the evidence add up to murder? Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on February 22, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
